txt.en: 'Well it’s about time! Oh I do so hope they’ll have meat pies.'
Return to the sneaky hobbit at the Party Tree
'Did you deliver all of the invitations?'
'Finally! Can you believe I thought I wasn’t invited?!'
'Have you delivered all of the invitations?'
'Ah hah! My wife will finally stop asking after this now.'
The sneaky hobbit can be found near the Party Tree in the Shire.\n\nYou should let the sneaky hobbit know that you have delivered all of the invitations.
'Hmmm. This had best be better than the last party they threw. Can you believe they made us all leave after only two days?!'
A sneaky hobbit is looking for help delivering wedding invitations.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends.</rgb>
'Hah! I knew Lobelia was wrong about them not inviting me! Wait 'till I show her this!'

DNT - \n'Haha! Excellent. The bride will be most pleased and my larders will not be as strained as the last wedding. What a disaster that was! Thanks you for your help, friend! Oh, uh... I would invite you to the wedding also, however, I'm sure you are quite too busy to attend. Good day to you!'
Delivered invitations to Troublesome Hobbits ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Haha! Excellent. The bride will be most pleased and my larders will not be as strained as the last wedding. What a disaster that was! Thank you for your help, friend! Oh, uh... I would invite you to the wedding also, however, I'm sure you are quite too busy to attend. Good day to you!'
'Well it is about time! If you will excuse me, I have to show this to my sister. Imagine thinking I wasn't invited.'
Delivered deceptive invitations ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Ah, yes, you will do perfectly. Listen, if you could do me a favour I would really appreciate it! We have a wedding planned and… well, let’s say that the bride would really appreciate it if some of our more troublesome neighbours were not in attendance.\n\n'I have a stack of invitations here whose information might be a bit… misleading, if you catch my drift. If you could deliver these to our good neighbours, I know the bride would really appreciate it!'
Deliver invitations to Troublesome Hobbits ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Troublesome hobbits can be found around the Shire.\n\nA sneaky hobbit has asked you to deliver deceptive invitations to her troublesome neighbours.
Deliver deceptive invitations ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'What’s this? An invitation? Of course I’ll be there!'
Deceptive Invitations
'I knew my invitation got lost by the post! I shall have to get a new dress, and shoes!'
